pullRequest.body:
Some API for interactions between independence, closure and single-element insertions/differences in matroids. 

---

GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:

- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

I think there are a few more names where `forall` should come a bit earlier.

Thanks :tada:

bors merge

I guess this could be a one-line proof using the more general lemma that if you remove a set `s` but `s \subset M.closure (X \ s)` then the closure doesn't change.

Do you think it's useful to have that lemma?

```suggestion
lemma indep_iff_forall_closure_ssubset_of_ssubset (hI : I âŠ† M.E := by aesop_mat) :
```

```suggestion
lemma indep_iff_forall_closure_diff_ne : M.Indep I â†” âˆ€ e âˆˆ I,
```
Is it useful to generalize `{e}` to arbitrary nonempty sets?

```suggestion
    M.Indep I â†” âˆ€ J, J âŠ‚ I â†’ M.closure J âŠ‚ M.closure I := by
```
Can you make `e` (and similar binders in the RHS of your new lemmas) semi-implicit? This is going to be useful when people use your lemmas in the forward direction.

accident?
```suggestion
It has a couple of other advantages too: it is actually the closure function of a matroid on `Î±`
```

accident?
```suggestion
lemma Indep.closure_iInter_eq_biInter_closure_of_forall_subset [Nonempty Î¹] {Js : Î¹ â†’ Set Î±}
```

```suggestion
lemma closure_insert_congr (he : e âˆˆ M.closure (insert f X) \ M.closure X) :
```
maybe

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Data/Matroid/Closure): closure + insertion API
